item.title: Chapter 8.1: Introduction
item.description: While model parameters are optimized during training, hyperparameters must be specified before the training. In this section, we will motivate why it is crucial to find good values for, i.e. to “tune”, these hyperparameters.

item.title: Chapter 8.2: Problem Definition
item.description: Hyperparameter tuning is the process of finding good model hyperparameters. In this section we formalize the problem of tuning and explain why tuning is computationally hard.

item.title: Chapter 8.3: Basic Techniques
item.description: In this section familiarize ourselves with two simple but popular tuning strategies, namely grid search and random search, and discuss their advantages and disadvantages.
